The Iranian regime has long persecuted Christians, Baha’is and other religious minorities. The recent uptick in repression, specifically targeting Christians and Christian converts, is alarming and unacceptable. 
https://www.foxnews.com/world/iran-launched-christmas-crackdown-on-persecuted-christian-minority

RT @RepJohnCurtis JOINT STATEMENT from Rep. Curtis, @RepRobBishop & @RepChrisStewart regarding @SenMikeLee & @SenatorRomney's PURE Act, legislation to protect Utah from unilateral intrusion through the Antiquities Act. #utpol http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwpomCVXcAIOo8t.jpg

RT @SenBooker Today I joined @SenSanders, @SenBlumenthal & colleagues in the House & Senate to introduce 3 bills that would lower prescription drug prices. Congress must take action to bring down skyrocketing costs of prescription drugs in America. https://www.booker.senate.gov/?p=press_release&id=882 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dwlc1nxXgAAxsWS.jpg
A real national emergency is the epidemic of gun violence in America. On average, 96 people die from it every single day. Let's do something about that.

Our air traffic control workers at Boston Logan & across the country have incredibly important jobs. They shouldn’t be worrying about their paychecks when they’re keeping us safe – and that means @realDonaldTrump needs to end his shameful shutdown. https://www.bostonglobe.com/metro/2019/01/08/air-traffic-controllers-logan-airport-not-know-when-they-will-next-paid-union-says/1ak8CL6BYv6buYm3j1rWbO/story.html

Iran launched Christmas crackdown on persecuted Christian minority https://www.foxnews.com/world/iran-launched-christmas-crackdown-on-persecuted-christian-minority #FoxNews

Californians: You only have a few days left to enroll in a health insurance plan before the January 15 deadline! #GetCovered TODAY at: https://www.coveredca.com/

Yesterday's trip was very valuable. I met w @CBP & families who have lost loved ones to illegal immigration--real human tragedies. When you see the Democrats force a gov shutdown bc they’re opposed to securing the border, that’s out of touch & not where the American people are. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1083746691189223425/img/w_9-42V6Hp-StqVP.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1083746691189223425/vid/320x180/IiuSHs12KKskQQR2.mp4?tag=11

At this point those who use the terms “racially tinged” or “racially charged” to describe white supremacy should be prepared to explain why they chose to employ those terms instead of “racist”/“racism.”

If the answer is their own discomfort, they’re protecting the wrong people.

The Ayatollahs persecute Christians, and anyone else who refuses to accept their theocratic vision, because they fear freedom of conscience. Iran’s repeated and worsening persecution of Christians is unacceptable and must stop.

RT @JohnCornyn Yesterday after visiting the border with @POTUS, @SenTedCruz and I sat down with @BPUnion leaders to hear about the priorities of our Border Patrol agents on the front lines http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwpUbLiX0AAsv15.jpg

Air traffic controllers have incredibly stressful jobs keeping us safe – but federal ATCs aren’t getting paid during the shutdown. The House already voted to fund the FAA this week. It’s time for the Senate to do the same. #EndTheShutdown https://www.washingtonpost.com/local/trafficandcommuting/air-traffic-controllers-get-their-first-shutdown-pay-stub-000/2019/01/10/080255e4-1525-11e9-b6ad-9cfd62dbb0a8_story.html?utm_term=.d5e09e72cd1b

Things that are national emergencies:
-30 million without health insurance
-15 million children in poverty
-Tens of thousands dying from opioids and gun violence
-Climate change

Things that are not national emergencies:
-Building a border wall to satisfy Fox News

On this day 75 years ago, President Franklin D. Roosevelt made a declaration about the rights that all Americans deserve. The fight to guarantee these rights for every American remains unfinished. Now it’s up to all of us. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwqyfEjWoAIJtgB.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1083869451961942016/vid/320x320/gUSY_rAKE7NWNows.mp4?tag=11

To quote Alan Moore: “None of you understand. I'm not locked up in here with YOU. You're locked up in here with ME.” 🤣 https://twitter.com/cristobaljalex/status/1083709582621454341 QT @CristobalJAlex Let me try and save folks some time here. You cannot rein in Latinas. They rein you in. #YearOfTheLatina #FutureIsLatina 

“Exasperated Democrats try to rein in @AOC” https://www.politico.com/story/2019/01/11/alexandria-ocasio-cortez-democrats-establisment-1093728 @politico

The real crisis in our country today is that we have a President who is putting politics over the needs of the American public. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1083768756655009795/img/RPmyalRkKZuqbUPY.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1083768756655009795/vid/320x180/qjsMpiDhOagPVzlk.mp4?tag=9

For many federal workers, missing a paycheck is a big deal. There is rent to pay now, kids to feed now, and bills that are stacking up. It’s day 21. It’s time for the president and McConnell to end this. 
https://www.huffingtonpost.com/entry/government-shutdown-missed-first-paycheck_us_5c37e522e4b045f6768a7877

Ending government corruption isn’t just a Democratic value. Most people – Democrats, Republicans, & Independents – want a government that works for them. We’re building a grassroots movement to fight that fight. https://www.vox.com/policy-and-politics/2019/1/3/18148633/hr1-voters-independents-anti-corruption-bill-poll

Too many people are being harmed by the president’s need for a vanity project. This time, it’s survivors of domestic violence and child abuse.
https://twitter.com/politico/status/1083477346349404160 QT @politico Survivors of domestic violence, child abuse and other crimes could be hit next by the government shutdown as shelters across the country are bracing for federal funds to dry up in the coming weeks https://trib.al/Nfc2KsL

You spelled “racist” wrong. https://twitter.com/davidmdrucker/status/1083797699395284993 QT @DavidMDrucker NEWS: @SteveKingIA said he "initiated" a convo today w/ @SteveScalise to inform them he would speak on floor to address his racially-tinged remarks. RT @SenBooker Proud to cosponsor 3 bills today to lower prescription drug costs, including the Affordable & Safe Prescription Drug Importation Act, a bill I wrote with @SenSanders in 2017 to allow for the safe importation of drugs from Canada & other countries to lower costs. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1083532722159710213/pu/img/fj2C-zcmnnf1MR7q.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1083532722159710213/pu/vid/320x320/KNhmdebfFCL6O2KN.mp4?tag=8

Mexico won't pay for @realDonaldTrump's stupid wall, and neither will Congress. So now, he's considering using dollars that were supposed to go to disaster recovery efforts in Puerto Rico, TX, CA & elsewhere to fund his political stunt. Unacceptable. https://www.cnn.com/2019/01/10/politics/border-wall-disaster-recovery-military-construction/index.html

Last year, the five largest drug companies in America made nearly $60 billion in profits. The top five pharma CEOs made over $113 million in total compensation in 2017.

Meanwhile, 1 in 5 Americans can’t afford their prescriptions. That should outrage every member of Congress.

.@RepScottPeters has a message for @realDonaldTrump: listen to bipartisan ideas on border security, abandon the wall, and #EndTheShutdown. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwrLDJYWoAEcuyD.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1083900514318864385/vid/320x180/xs_aB5Z-5yMtOCa3.mp4?tag=9

Members of the US Coast Guard and other federal employees should be cashing their paychecks today. But thanks to the #TrumpShutdown, some will be visiting local food banks instead. Actually, the real way out is for GOP Senators to vote to reopen government, give people their paychecks, and fight for their wall another day.

To the aide that deemed nat’l emergency an “elegant” solution: tell that to the 1000s of US immigrants endangered by such a decision. https://twitter.com/slate/status/1083919042539388928 QT @Slate Bipartisan consensus is forming: Trump’s national emergency might be the only way out. https://slate.com/news-and-politics/2019/01/national-emergency-government-shutdown-border-wall-trump-waiting.html?via=rss_socialflow_twitter

✅ Give honest, working people their pay back
✅ Pass legislation that actually helps people
✅ Stop asking the Koch Brothers’ permission to go to the bathroom

RT @EmpowerTexans Today we will be broadcasting a FB LIVE with Senator @tedcruz at 11:00 am! Stay tuned here --> https://www.facebook.com/empowertexans/videos/290500068324392

Thank you for being open. 
It’s time we call it what it is. https://twitter.com/DavidMDrucker/status/1083913989795602434 QT @DavidMDrucker @AOC Appreciate the edit.
I’m live NOW with @MQSullivan! Tune in: https://www.facebook.com/empowertexans/videos/290500068324392?sfns=cl #TXSen http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwpX8yeWsAEKPrE.jpg

The House passed two bills last week to reopen the government, and yesterday, McConnell blocked them. 

Let that sink in. Tomorrow we break the record for the longest government shutdown. Let’s vote on these bills.

One month ago at a meeting with Democratic leaders, the president said, “I am proud to shut down the government for border security...so I will take the mantle. I will be the one to shut it down.”

He did it and now 800,000 federal workers are suffering. Reopen the government.

Seems the new Reciprocal Access to #Tibet law has gotten the attention of the Chinese Gov't. Time will tell if they open up Tibet & stop brutally repressing the Tibetan people. In the meantime, @StateDept should 
swiftly implement the bill.
https://www.business-standard.com/article/pti-stories/after-new-us-law-china-plans-to-issue-faster-permits-for-foreigners-to-visit-tibet-119011000911_1.html

I will be moving more of what I do on social media to Instagram in 2019. Log in or Sign up & follow me at  (@marcorubiofla) • Instagram photos and videos https://www.instagram.com/marcorubiofla/?hl=en

We can't let billionaires & giant corporations buy our Democratic primary in 2020. Every Democratic presidential candidate should link arms & pledge to run grassroots campaigns. Disavow Super PACs, & no self-funding. Sign on if you agree. https://my.elizabethwarren.com/page/s/ew-superpacs?source=tw http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwpsVvcW0AAU2tc.jpg
It is imperative that we support religious liberty around the world, and work to end the persecution of Christians and people of all faiths.

I do not believe the White House will divert money from #Florida disaster recovery to fund border security. 

But if some reason they try, I will do everything I can to overturn such a decision. https://www.wsj.com/articles/white-house-looking-into-diverting-army-corps-funds-to-build-wall-11547161664

I met (and hugged) a lot of great people in Iowa who are ready to fight. New Hampshire, I’m looking forward to meeting you this weekend! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwpG2uKXcAApfSR.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1083725552568188929/vid/320x320/QTCBJzMdDMipmRpJ.mp4?tag=11

RT @SenBooker Trump continues to lie & stoke fears about an imaginary "crisis" at our southern border. The real crisis is with the thousands of federal workers & their families who are going unpaid, can't make rent & pay their bills as a result of the #TrumpShutdown. https://www.vox.com/2019/1/9/18172329/partial-government-shutdown-paycheck

Another consequence of the shutdown: the EPA can’t monitor whether companies are emitting illegal levels of contaminants into our air or water. https://twitter.com/nytimes/status/1083189706471493633 QT @nytimes The shutdown has halted one of the federal government’s most important public health activities, the inspections of chemical factories, power plants, oil refineries, water treatment plants, and thousands of other industrial sites for pollution violations https://trib.al/MFysm37

RT @SenTedCruz I know the MSM hates covering the need for border security, but why is @Twitter formally labeling it “sensitive material?” http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwmmEOXWkAAO1Hb.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwmmEOeWoAAu31R.jpg

There’s no crisis at the border but Trump’s shutdown is creating a crisis: The safety of the nation’s air travel system is at risk, tax refunds might not go out on time, national parks are overflowing with trash and hundreds of thousands of federal employees aren’t getting paid. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dwp_tSIWsAAKhju.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1083815575539855360/vid/320x320/NZn-SGyTmco73z0V.mp4?tag=9

No family should be forced to choose between purchasing lifesaving drugs and paying the bills. I’m proud to introduce the Prescription Drug Price Relief Act with my colleagues to make sure that Americans are paying close to the same amount for drugs as people in other countries.

Glorify the LORD, Jerusalem; Zion, offer praise to your God, For he has strengthened the bars of your gates, blessed your children within you. He brings peace to your borders, and satisfies you with finest wheat.

Psalms 147: 12-14

Just read this. Heartbroken and bittersweet. I want @jinnotjim and every single Dreamer to know – regardless of academic intellect, or economic contribution – America is your home, you belong here, and the fight to protect you is not over. https://twitter.com/nytopinion/status/1083727952511143936 QT @nytopinion Being named a Rhodes scholar validated all the sacrifices my parents made so that I could have a better future. But if leave to study in Oxford, I may not be able to come back, says @JinNotJim. https://trib.al/80iHCon

It’s outrageous to consider diverting disaster funding for a border wall. Our people have a right to believe their government will act in their best interest, not act irresponsibly for a vanity project. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dwp5veqWkAE-DtS.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1083812168729063425/vid/320x180/_0iDhCZCsrJY5c2a.mp4?tag=11

Trump continues to lie & stoke fears about an imaginary "crisis" at our southern border. The real crisis is with the thousands of federal workers & their families who are going unpaid, can't make rent & pay their bills as a result of the #TrumpShutdown. https://www.vox.com/2019/1/9/18172329/partial-government-shutdown-paycheck

Air traffic controllers got paychecks for a total of $0 today because of Trump's government shutdown.

This is a crisis!

Mr. Trump, stop holding our federal employees hostage as political pawns. Open the government now. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwpVE_VWoAEXByP.jpg

Es importante que los países de la región continúen presionando al régimen narcoterrorista de #Maduro. Aplaudo la decisión del presidente @MaritoAbdo de romper relaciones diplomáticas con #Venezuela. https://twitter.com/MaritoAbdo/status/1083399093722976257 QT @MaritoAbdo Comunicado oficial de Cancillería sobre #Venezuela http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwkBuUnWkAAxiQy.jpg

For too long, members of Congress have abused their power and ignored the will of the American people. 

Term limits on members of Congress offer a solution to the brokenness we see in Washington, D.C: http://action.tedcruz.org/term-limits/

Please watch this great speech from @SenatorTimScott. 
 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NkZIU9uW5r8&feature=youtu.be via @YouTube

This is the real cost of the shutdown. A breast cancer survivor having to decide between buying medications or buying food. A family selling their truck to pay for the house and keep the heat on. This shutdown is hurting Americans. 
https://www.nytimes.com/2019/01/08/us/paychecks-government-shutdown.html

People have to speak up about the government shutdown and put the pressure on this Administration to reopen the government. There is power in that. 
http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwoSvwjXgAABHuZ.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1083699133284843520/vid/320x180/V1bP0Vs9OuEth4z_.mp4?tag=11

RT @TPPF .@KevinRobertsTX reigns in the conversation and points towards the border crisis, “What is the solution to today’s #immigration problems?” 

Senators discuss their recent trip to the border with @realDonaldTrump. @SenTedCruz says we must pass common-sense solutions. #po2019 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dwp1xDOUUAE40AY.jpg

Do people realize how insanely dangerous of an idea it is to support *this President* in fabricating a “national emergency” over immigrants, especially when Homeland Security officially assessed the threat level at the southern border “minimal?”

No way. Pressure your Senators.

A few days ago I asked people to share how the government shutdown was affecting them. Thousands wrote in — sharing stories about their wife who is furloughed or their closest friend that has to borrow money to make rent this month.
